experience: You and Charlotte both know Matt Greene, Steven Aldrich, and 38 others
BCG research shows the more men are involved in a gender diversity program, the more progress the company makes #FGBgalvanize  #women #WIT @godaddy
Thanks to all who were able to attend our Cedar Rapids GoDaddy Hiring Event, last night! #GoDaddyLife #GoDaddyIowa

My amazing Talent Acquisition team is looking for a contract Technical Recruiter in the Seattle area.  You'd work 40 hours per week out of our Kirkland office on the east side.  If you or someone you know may be interested, please let me know!
This is such important work - removing unconscious bias from the hiring process, promotional and performance consideration process, and company values!
Exclusive: Why GoDaddy Promoted 30% More Women This Year
Senior Technical Recruiter, Global Talent Acquisition
Connecting people around the world who have a passion for scalable software, intuitive products, and a delightful customer experience with GoDaddy as their next work family.
Full Lifecycle Technical and Corporate Recruiter

Hiring the best and brightest minds for all 10 GoDaddy locations across the United States.  I like to say that I hire for both coasts and every time zone in between.  Every role from a Senior Marketing Manager to a Lead Data Center Engineer, a Data Scientist to an SDET, an Outbound Sales Executive to a Senior Director of Software Engineering.  Curious about GoDaddy?  Just ask!
Recruiting Coordinator and Project Leader, Talent Acquisition

Led and managed various projects across the GoDaddy Talent Acquisition department, including selecting and implementing a new Onboarding system, converting to paperless interview guides and electronic offer letters, and selecting and implementing a foreign language screening vendor.  Coordinated the hiring of 90 sales and technical support employees every month, including onboarding and all pre-employment processing.

Labor Relations, Medical Leaves including FMLA and ADA interpretation and administration, New Hire Onboarding and employment processing, H1B and I9 compliance, Customer Experience initiatives, interviewing and hiring
Member of the Society for Human Resource Management

summary: My mission as a Senior Technical Recruiter is to find, inspire, and hire the best minds in our diverse tech community of risk-takers, go-getters and game-changers.  You can follow me professionally on LinkedIn as a Technical Recruiter, or you can follow my nerdy adventures to new places and geeky interests on Twitter: @geekychar.I have experience in full life-cycle technical recruiting including: sourcing, candidate engagement, events planning and coordination, screening and interviewing, partnering closely with business units and teams, training my internal stakeholders on best practices including teaching workshops, internal hiring, offer negotiation including compensation and equity conversations, closing candidates, visas and work authorization, and on-boarding.  I hire for Data Center Techs, VPs of Engineering, UX Designer, Product Managers, Principal Software Engineers, and everything in between for our offices around the globe.
name: Charlotte DePew
title: Senior Technical Recruiter for Global Talent Acquisition
